titleStmt.title: Mundus nec fuit, nec potuit esse ab æterno
titleStmt.author: Rayne, John, 1672 or 3-1700.

notesStmt.note: The second column is titled "Dantur substantiæ immateriales." The third column is titled "Posita dubitatione cartesiana certa veritatis norma habèri non potest." The fourth column is titled "Libertas arbitrii soli substantiæ immateriali competit."
At foot of page [1]: Jul. 5. 1697. in vesper. comit. resp. in philosoph. Johan. Rayne, A.M. Coll. Joh. Soc.
At foot of page [2]: Jul. 6. 1697. in die comit. resp. in philosoph. Fr. Hare. A.M. Coll. Regal. Soc.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London.
